member.name: D2D1_DEVICE_CONTEXT_OPTIONS
member.summary: This specifies options that apply to the device context for its lifetime.

member.name: D2D1_DEVICE_CONTEXT_OPTIONS.D2D1_DEVICE_CONTEXT_OPTIONS_NONE
